How can I get information about a specific currency using the Verus command line?

You can get information about a specific currency using the `getcurrency` command. The basic format of the command is:

`verus getcurrency "currencyname"`

Replace `"currencyname"` with the name of the currency you want to get information about.

d Examples: > verus getcurrency "currencyname" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getcurrency", "params": ["currencyname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
